name: Square Wave (itch)
description:
Minimalistic arcade game. Avoid red waves. Collect crystals.

Use keyboard and mouse or gamepad. On keyboard: WASD + Spacebar (jump).

Credits

Hubert Rzepinski - programming, graphics and magic

Adam Piotrowski - game design, music, sound fx and unicorns

Patch 31-03-2017: Almost 50% reduced size. Crystals are now black so you could easily see them. Added "Options" menu to change graphic settings (low,medium, high).

//
